name: TrollHunter: Shadow Realm
description:
You are a Troll and you have been cursed with powers of the Shadow Realm. If sunlight touches you, then you will turn to stone. Using your shadow powers you must traverse platforms and obstacles on a journey to free yourself from this curse.

Created for KenneyJam2020

Please take sometime to vote!

Inspired by the hit Netflix TV series TrollHunters
